member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_KEY
member.summary: The HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_KEY enumeration defines the type of timer that is queried or configured through the structure.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_KEY.IdleConnectionTimeout
member.summary: The maximum time allowed for a connection to remain idle, after which, the connection is timed out and reset.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_KEY.HeaderWaitTimeout
member.summary: The maximum time allowed to parse all the request headers, including the request line, after which, the connection is timed out and reset.
